attributes.action: crown actor, comedian, and all round good egg Stephen Fry as the king/queen of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The function of the monarch is to delight, enthuse, and inspire the country and to act as a goodwill representative for this country to our foreign neightbours. We can think of no better person to do this than the good Fry, and he would certainly be better and cheaper than the encumbents

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
